QuestData.Title: Sneak Preview
QuestData.Description: Progress is being made. We have a promising array of tactics that should gain us control of the death gate. There will doubtlessly be many casualties, but in the end, we should be able to prevail - barring any interference from the Alliance.$b$bOur next focus will be Aldur'thar, the gate of desolation. Fly down and become familiar with it and with the enemies posted there.$b$bWhen you return, I will have your missions prepared.
QuestData.LogDescription: Koltira, aboard Orgrim's Hammer, wants you to fly down to the gate of desolation, visiting the south, central, north, and northwest regions of the gate.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you scouted the gate of desolation, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: Well and good, $c.$b$bNow that you've seen firsthand what we're up against, it's time to get to work...
